EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-EC Invitations-T001XI.Invite Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE! Enterprise Connect is around the corner. Book your meeting today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Enterprise Connect 2018 Nokia is launching the cloud-native SBC which allows you to:
- Minimize costs by eliminating hardware-based SBCs - Secure your network against untrusted devices and DDoS attacks - Increase customer satisfaction with new WebRTC services
Our team will be at Enterprise Connect 2018 in Orlando from March 12-15 at booth #207 and we hope to see you there!
Do you have a specific topic you would like to discuss with Nokia? Please book some time with one of our experts. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
